name: Bunker - Nightmare Begins
detailed_description:
Bunker is still in early access. Some features and gameplay are still in development.

Bunker (Nightmare Begins) is an indie game focused on psychological horror wherein you complete tasks in order to find a way to escape.
Bunker offers a different experience each time you play with three different game modes.
This encourages you to try, fail, and try again.

There is gamma controls but it is highly encouraged to play with the default for full effect of the darkness.

If you encounter problems that could trouble the gaming experience, please let us know.



Try experience in early access, survive and escape.
Wander in the corridors where the darkness will not be your only enemy.
Take everything you can find to survive, don't let yourself be trapped, do not get lost, hide yourself, make no noise, follow all the quests to the letter to escape.

Unlock other survival difficulty modes at each end of the game (Casual, Hard, Nightmare).

Difficulty - Casual
  • Game Time : 15 Minutes
  • Probability Objects Spawning : 50%
  • Fuse Indicator Distance : 15 Meters
  • AI Intelligence : Soft

Difficulty - Hard
  • Game Time : 10 Minutes
  • Probability Objects Spawning : 30%
  • Fuse Indicator Distance : 10 Meters
  • AI Intelligence : Crazy

Difficulty - Nightmare
  • Game Time : 5 Minutes
  • Probability Objects Spawning : 30%
  • Fuse Indicator Distance : 5 Meters
  • AI Intelligence : Unleash



Movement : WADS or Arrow keys
Strafe : Q & E.
Interaction : F
Drop : G
Jump : Space
Switch Weapon(s) : Mouse Wheel & Alpha Keys.
Sprint : Shift
Crouch : Ctrl
Pause Menu : Escape

Note : Editable input settings in the game menu settings.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 32-bit & 64-bit Operating Systems (Windows 7)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 or AMD FX-8120
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 Compatible GeForce GTX 460 1GB or AMD HD 6850 1GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: With these requirements, it is recommended that the game is played on low quality and without shaders.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 32-bit & 64-bit Operating Systems (Windows 7, Windows 10)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 or AMD FX-8300 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 Compatible GeForce 760 or AMD HD 8800 or 4GB of RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 MB available space
